subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant, Trevor Ariza, Pau Gasol and Lamar Odom had a big hand in Sunday’s 107-100 victory against the visiting Dallas Mavericks.
snippet: Kobe Bryant, Trevor Ariza, Pau Gasol and Lamar Odom had a big hand in Sunday’s 107-100 victory against the visiting Dallas Mavericks.
